word: "As the Father hath loved Me," He continues, "so have I loved you: continue ye in My love. If ye keep My commandments, ye shall abide in My love; even as I have kept My Father's commandments, and abide in His love" [verses 9, 10]. This language is so plain that there need be no mistake as to what God requires of us. "This is the love of God, that we keep His commandments: and His commandments are not grievous" [1 John 5:3].
